title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 570.5 - Reserved parking spaces
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 570.5 - Reserved parking spaces

State Regulations
(a) Exclusion
from open parking. Reserved spaces designated in the parking areas are provided
on a 24-hour per day basis and are to be used only by the individual or college
guests assigned. (b) Reserved space
will be provided for motorcycles to maintain maximum parking capacity in the
lots. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
ยง
570.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
